title: Gen X Just Made the Fox Body Mustang Cool Again
description: If you’re from the Gen X era, you probably have a Fox Body Mustang memory. Whether you owned one, knew someone who had one, or got smoked by one at a stoplight, the 1979 through 1993 Mustang defined affordable performance for a long time. These weren't exotics or rare muscle cars. They were ...
titleSummary: "Fox Body Revival: Generation X's Love Letter to Retro Muscle Cars"
descriptionSummary: For many Gen Xers, the Fox Body Mustang is an ingrained part of their automotive nostalgia. Affordable and accessible, these '79 to '93 models made high-performance driving possible for everyday enthusiasts without breaking the bank.

title: Mercedes-Benz Teases A Two-Door With Suicide Doors And Grand Proportions
description: Last month, Mercedes-Benz teased the first-ever all-electric C-Class with a rather quirky new front end, but if a new set of teasers from the automaker's Chief Design Officer is anything to go by, Mercedes hasn't forgotten how to do classic Art Deco style. Gorden Wagener has taken to Instagram to ...
titleSummary: Mercedes Debuts Alluring Coupe Concept with Dramatic Doors and Luxe Presence
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz is reviving its rich design heritage with a retro-inspired twist on the all-electric C-Class, as hinted at in recent teasers from Chief Design Officer Gorden Wagener's Instagram feed.

title: A Dog Triggered a Volvo’s Tailgate Sensor — Then It Allegedly Hit the Owner
description: Volvo is facing a lawsuit in New Jersey alleging that one of its motion-activated tailgate systems malfunctioned and caused serious injury. The complaint, filed by a woman named Megan Kohr, claims that a hands-free liftgate on a Volvo SUV closed unexpectedly when a dog passed under the vehicle, ...
titleSummary: "Canine Chaos: Fido Unintentionally Opens Car, Causes Owner to Get Crushed by Falling Trunk"
descriptionSummary: A New Jersey woman is suing Volvo, alleging that her hands-free tailgate malfunctioned after her dog walked underneath the vehicle, causing serious injury. The incident occurred while using a motion-activated system on her Volvo SUV.

title: Toyota's Real McCoy — Is the Corolla Finally Going All-Electric?
description: While everyone was tuned in waiting for Lexus and Toyota to finally show off the rumored LFR supercar, Toyota decided to flip the script. Instead of a V10 monster, we got something totally different, and arguably even more important. Meet the Toyota Corolla Concept, teased ahead of its full debut ...
titleSummary: "Corolla Goes Electric: Can Toyota's Best-Seller Make the Switch?"
descriptionSummary: Lexus enthusiasts were on the edge of their seats anticipating a high-performance supercar from the automaker, but Toyota surprised everyone with an unexpected reveal instead: a forward-thinking concept based on the humble Corolla nameplate.

title: You’re Subsidizing New Car Sales Every Time You Pay for Repairs
description: Two identical Trump tariffs landed this spring: 25% on imported new cars and the same 25% on imported parts. Automakers chose to swallow billions in losses to keep new-car sticker prices steady and shoppers walking into showrooms. Independent repair shops had no cushion, so they passed those same ...
titleSummary: "Hidden Fees in Your Repair Bill Are Secretly Funding Dealerships"
descriptionSummary: When the Trump administration imposed identical tariffs of 25% on both new cars and auto parts this spring, automakers absorbed massive losses to maintain stable prices for consumers, but independent repair shops felt the pinch without a financial buffer.

title: 2025 Toyota Sienna Hybrid Minivans Have A Serious Safety Issue In The Second Row
description: Not even Toyota is immune to the occasional manufacturing mistake, and following a massive recall for trucks and SUVs earlier this month, the Japanese automaker has now found an issue with some of its minivans. The issue concerns the 2025 Toyota Sienna hybrid minivan, some of which may have ...
titleSummary: "New Toyota Sienna Hybrids Hit Road with Hidden Danger in Middle Seat"
descriptionSummary: Toyota's latest quality control blip affects certain 2025 Sienna hybrid minivans, following a major recall for trucks and SUVs earlier this month. A manufacturing issue has been identified in some of these vehicles, requiring attention from the automaker.

title: Hyundai Drops Killer 2026 Palisade Lease Deal For October
description: The second-generation Hyundai Palisade arrived earlier this year and is a notable improvement over the popular first-gen version. Not only does it have an ultra-modern, near-luxury look, but it comes with the option of an efficient hybrid powertrain. With all that’s new, we were pleasantly ...
titleSummary: Hyundai Unveils Game-Changing Palisade Lease Offer This Fall
descriptionSummary: The revamped Hyundai Palisade made its debut this year, boasting a sophisticated and upscale aesthetic, alongside a cutting-edge hybrid engine option that elevates its capabilities and appeal. We took it for a spin with high expectations.

title: Mercedes-Benz's New Mobile Lab Van is Rethinking How We Charge EVs
description: It might not be Christmas just yet, but Mercedes-Benz is working on a new vehicle that it calls the ELF, short for Experimental-Lade-Fahrzeug, or Experimental Charging Vehicle in English. The prototype is built using one of the brand’s Metris vans and is designed to be Mercedes’ mobile lab, ...
titleSummary: "Revving Up Innovation: Mercedes-Benz Unveils Cutting-Edge EV Charging Solution on Wheels"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz is prepping a cutting-edge vehicle known as the ELF, an experimental electric mobility concept based on a modified Metris van. This versatile platform will serve as a mobile testing ground for innovative charging solutions.

title: Oh No — Honda Prelude Isn't As Quick As Expected
description: The return of the Honda Prelude was always bound to stir excitement – not only for fans of the nameplate, which are apparently mostly middle-aged men, but also for the entire industry that's starting to lack mainstream coupes. With a Civic Type R-derived suspension and a new S+ Shift system, many ...
titleSummary: "Honda Prelude Falls Short on Performance, Leaving Enthusiasts Disappointed"
descriptionSummary: The long-awaited revival of the Honda Prelude is generating buzz, driven by nostalgia among enthusiasts and a broader industry craving for mainstream coupes. Its advanced features are set to shake up the market.

title: Toyota's Century Coupe and Wild Lexus Minivan are Competely Out of the Left Field
description: It's pretty much set in stone that Toyota is revealing a new flagship performance car – a project tied to the Lexus LFA and the Toyota 2000GT lineage. But little did anyone expect the world's largest automaker to have two even stranger surprises waiting in the wings. While the LFA successor remains ...

title: Kia Tasman Sales Are Tanking In a Country Known For Utes

descriptionSummary: Despite a strong debut, Kia's Tasman is struggling to gain traction in Australia, with sales lagging significantly behind initial projections. Price discounts and added extras haven't yet sparked demand, putting its ambitious 10,000-unit target for 2025 at risk of being missed.

description: X-Tomi Design renders a Honda Prelude Cabriolet with folding fabric roofRetains eCVT and 200-hp hybrid four-cylinderPrelude convertibles were built by Solaire Corporation When Honda revealed the revived 2026 Prelude earlier this year, fans were thrilled – until the specs dropped. This reinterpretation echoes the Japanese automaker's brief collaboration with Solaire Corporation on convertible Preludes in the past.

title: Lamborghini CEO: “It’s the Wrong Time for a Full EV”
description: When Lamborghini revealed the Lanzador concept two years ago, it was as a step into the electric era – a high-riding 2+2 "Ultra GT" that would introduce the brand's first zero-emission powertrain. It was supposed to be the next chapter for the Sant'Agata marque. However, the plan has since ...

descriptionSummary: Lamborghini's Lanzador concept marked a pivotal moment two years ago, signaling the Italian luxury brand's entrance into the electric era with an ultra-luxurious 2+2 "Ultra GT" featuring its first zero-emission powertrain.

description: A Kia EV6 owner has made a modification to their car's sound system that nets owners significantly improved audio quality by rewiring the EV6's trunk-mounted subwoofer. titleSummary: "Kia's Hidden Problem Solved by Resourceful EV6 Driver's Sharp Eye"
descriptionSummary: A resourceful Kia EV6 owner has discovered a clever hack to boost their car's audio quality by repurposing the subwoofer's wiring in the trunk. This simple tweak can significantly enhance sound clarity and depth for drivers.

descriptionSummary: Mansory's most extreme creation yet is the Grand Entrée, a bespoke Benz boasting breathtaking enhancements to both power and aesthetics. Only eight examples will be crafted, showcasing Mansory's signature flair for the dramatic.

titleSummary: "Nissan Rebirths Axed Electric Crossover with Sweeping Redesign and Enhanced Tech"
descriptionSummary: At the Japan Mobility Show in Tokyo, Nissan will unveil two highly anticipated models: the next-generation Elgrand and the all-new Ariya. This preview aligns with the company's forward-thinking Re:Imagine strategy, highlighting innovative mobility solutions and cutting-edge technology.

title: Volvo’s Genius Safety Belt Named One Of TIME’s Top 2025 Inventions

titleSummary: "Volvo's Game-Changing Seatbelt Lands on TIME's List of Most Groundbreaking Innovations of 2025"
descriptionSummary: Volvo's innovative safety belt has been hailed as one of TIME magazine's top inventions, solidifying its reputation as a leader in transportation safety. This recognition marks Volvo's second consecutive year among TIME's honorees, with their latest safety innovation set to debut in next year's EX60 model.

title: Lucid Sales Are on the Rise. But Is It Fast Enough?
description: Lucid Motors just posted its best quarter ever. The luxury EV startup delivered 4,078 vehicles in the third quarter of 2025, marking its seventh consecutive delivery record and a 46% year-over-year increase. It’s a sign that Lucid’s long-awaited production ramp is finally gaining traction — though ...
titleSummary: "Market Momentum Gains Speed, but Lags Behind Optimistic Projections"
descriptionSummary: Lucid Motors has achieved unprecedented success with 4,078 vehicle deliveries in Q3, 2025, shattering previous records for the seventh time running and showcasing a significant 46% year-over-year surge. This milestone suggests the company's production efforts are finally hitting their stride.

title: Honda CR-V Turns 30: 4 Milestone Models That Shaped Its Legacy
description: A staple of the Honda lineup for years, the CR-V compact crossover has just turned 30. Yes, this RAV4 rival was officially introduced in Japan three decades ago, when the first generation went on sale there. Since then, the CR-V has become Honda’s best-selling individual model in several markets, ...
titleSummary: "Three Decades of Innovation: The Evolutionary Journeys Behind Honda's Beloved Compact SUV"
descriptionSummary: The Honda CR-V celebrates a major milestone: 30 years of compact crossover excellence. Introduced in Japan three decades ago as the first-generation model, it's since become a top seller worldwide and a key player in Honda's global lineup.

title: Drivers Furious as Volvo’s New Key System Only Works With iPhones
description: Volvo's controversial decision to replace traditional key fobs with credit card-style keys in its EX30 and EX90 electric vehicles may be short-lived. Stephen Connor, Managing Director of Volvo Australia, revealed to Drive that the company is considering scrapping the key card system entirely based ...
titleSummary: "Volvo's iPhone Exclusive Locks Out Other Smartphone Owners"
descriptionSummary: Volvo's innovative key-card system, introduced in its EX30 and EX90 models, may soon face an unexpected overhaul. According to Volvo Australia's Managing Director, a major rethink could be on the cards due to evolving consumer preferences and concerns.

titleSummary: "Mercedes Pledges to Go Green, But Its Roadmap Still Runs on Fossil Fuels"
descriptionSummary: Mercedes-Benz has outlined a strategy to reduce carbon emissions in its components, but its efforts are complicated by its CEO's opposition to an impending EU ban on internal combustion engines.

title: Porsche Learns From VW And Commits To Buttons
description: For Porsche, certain physical controls in the company's interiors are now taboo. These won't be removed, say company executives, after the brand initially did so in its Taycan EV. The Taycan made more extensive use of haptics and touch controls than previous Porsche models, and eschewed the brand's ...
titleSummary: "Buttoning Up: Porsche Takes Cue from Volkswagen's Design Revamp"
descriptionSummary: Porsche is shifting away from traditional physical controls in its interiors, opting instead for haptic feedback and touchscreen interfaces. This approach, first seen in the Taycan EV, is here to stay according to company executives.

title: The Most Accurate Look Yet at the Next Alfa Romeo Stelvio
description: The next-generation Alfa Romeo Stelvio is nearing its global debut, marking the second generation for the brand’s first SUV. titleSummary: Exclusive First Glimpse of the Highly Anticipated 2024 Alfa Romeo SUV Upgrade
descriptionSummary: The long-awaited successor to Alfa Romeo's pioneering Stelvio SUV is nearing its world premiere, ushering in a new era for the brand. A June "New Chapter" announcement hinted at a major reveal, but it ended up being something entirely different – a nod to the automaker's sailing partnership.

descriptionSummary: This article highlights an upgrade package for the Tesla Model Y Performance, which boosts aerodynamics and features interchangeable components. The kit can be purchased separately or as a bundle with wheels, comparable in price to the FSD suite.

Buzz van, the German brand’s lineup covers nearly every mainstream segment. However, there are also ID models that rarely make international headlines. One of ...

descriptionSummary: Volkswagen's expanding ID electric family includes well-known models like the ID.3 and ID.7, but a lesser-known subset offers intriguing options for those looking beyond the mainstream offerings in its lineup.

title: 1-of-1 1962 Ferrari 250 GTO, Bianco Speciale, is Headed to Mecum Kissimee

The Ferrari 250 GTO is one such car, built by Ferrari for homologation into the FIA's Group 3 Grand Touring Car. While ...
titleSummary: Rarest of Rare: 1962 Ferrari 250 GTO Set for Auction in Florida this Spring
descriptionSummary: Legendary vehicles like the Ferrari 250 GTO have captivated enthusiasts worldwide with their remarkable tales of achievement and iconic status. This prized model was crafted by Ferrari to meet the FIA's Group 3 regulations, showcasing its exceptional design and prowess on the track.

title: Toyota's Upcoming Flagship Supercar Is More Important Than You Think

descriptionSummary: Get ready for Toyota's most anticipated supercar yet, set to make its global debut on October 13 at Fuji Speedway. This highly-anticipated model is poised to become a collector's dream, built upon the legendary foundations of the 2000GT and Lexus LFA.

description: Ferrari has confirmed that internal combustion will remain a cornerstone of its lineup, even as the company accelerates its hybrid and electric programs. At its 2025 Capital Markets Day, Ferrari outlined a long-term plan to continue producing its iconic V6, V8, and V12 engines well into ...
titleSummary: Ferrari Sticks with Tradition, Hybrid Engines Replace Full Electrification Plans
descriptionSummary: Ferrari is doubling down on its heritage while embracing change, with internal combustion engines set to remain at the heart of its offerings alongside rapidly advancing hybrid and electric technologies.

title: BMW Just Built the World’s First AI Car Factory
description: Find out how BMW's Debrecen plant uses AI tech and renewables to revolutionize EV manufacturing.
titleSummary: "Revolution on Wheels: BMW Unveils Groundbreaking AI-Powered Vehicle Assembly Plant"
descriptionSummary: Discover the innovative approach behind BMW's Debrecen facility, where cutting-edge artificial intelligence and sustainable energy solutions are transforming the production of electric vehicles into a high-tech, eco-friendly process.

title: Finally, a Restomod Builder Brave Enough to Ignore the Porsche 911
description: The Porsche 904 Carrera GTS stands as one of Stuttgart's most significant racing machines. With only 106 examples built between 1963 and 1964, this mid-engined marvel won several races, including first and second at the 1964 Targa Florio. Meanwhile, the Porsche 914 occupies the opposite end of the ...
titleSummary: "Taking on the Unholy Trinity: A Rebel's Approach to Restored Supercars"
descriptionSummary: In the Porsche stable, few cars embody racing excellence like the 904 Carrera GTS. Built in limited numbers between '63 and '64, it proved a winning machine, claiming top spots at the 1964 Targa Florio among other victories. In contrast, its more laid-back counterpart, the 914, represents another iconic chapter in Porsche's storied history.

title: Keep things simple with this 1994 Ford Ranger XL
description: As the song says, sometimes you don't know what you've got 'til it's gone. The current midsize Ford Ranger is an appealing pickup truck in its own right, but its size and emphasis on creature comforts makes it easier appreciate the last compact Rangers from the 1990s and early 2000s, which largely ...
titleSummary: "Rugged Simplicity Revived: 1994 Ford Ranger XL Hits the Mark"
descriptionSummary: We often take things for granted until they're no longer with us. The modern Ford Ranger is a capable pickup, but its larger dimensions make us nostalgic for the smaller, more rugged compact Rangers that preceded it.

description: The Ioniq 5 continues to gain traction, with year-to-date sales up 36 percent in 2025.Hyundai has reduced the 2026 Ioniq 5 prices by as much as $9,800 across all trims.Deep discounts on 2025 models make them still worth considering.Buyers must weigh the savings against minor updates for 2026. title: Automakers Pull the Plug on An Array of EVs – Here’s What We’ll Miss
description: With EV sales widely expected to tank now that federal tax credits have ended, automakers from around the world are rethinking their commitments to the technology. In recent weeks, we’ve gotten word models like the Nissan Ariya, Acura ZDX and Volvo ES90 will either be pulled from production or ...
titleSummary: Electric Vehicles Get a Reality Check: Which Ones Are Being Left in the Dust?
descriptionSummary: As EV sales are expected to decline following the expiration of federal tax credits, automakers globally are reassessing their investment in electric vehicle technology. Several models, including the Nissan Ariya and Volvo ES90, may soon see production cease or be significantly altered.

title: The Most Famous Name in Car Design Just Broke Tradition With AI
description: Pininfarina has been giving shape to automotive dreams since 1930. The Italian design house has sculpted everything from the most beautiful Ferraris ever to the electric Battista hypercar. So when Californian startup Vittori approached them to design the Turbio hypercar, we’re sure eyebrows raised. ...

title: Rivian CEO Warns of ‘Existential Threat’ as Trump Moves to Let Chinese EVs Into U.S.

But as Autoblog recently reported, Pres. Donald Trump is widely expected to open the door to those ...
titleSummary: "US Automakers Face Electric Shock as Trump Opens Door to Foreign Rivals"
descriptionSummary: A surprising coalition of established automakers has long viewed Chinese carmakers like Geely, BYD, and Great Wall as a formidable threat. Now, with President Trump poised to ease restrictions, their entry into the US market may soon become a reality.

descriptionSummary: This ultra-rare SLS AMG coupe is a nod to the iconic 300 SL Gullwing. Only around 1,900 coupes were produced between 2010 and 2014, making this low-mileage example (just 5,000 miles on the odometer) truly special.

title: Toyota’s Bold Bet: Why It’s Doubling Down on Hydrogen as Rivals Go All-Electric
description: While most automakers are doubling down on battery-electric cars, Toyota continues to chart its own course, one that keeps hydrogen fuel cells at the center of its long-term strategy. The company calls this approach “multi-pathway,” a philosophy that embraces hybrids, plug-in hybrids, battery EVs, ...
titleSummary: "Hydrogen High-Stakes Gamble: Toyota Bets Big on Fuel Cells Amid Electric Frenzy"
descriptionSummary: As other automakers shift focus to battery-electric vehicles, Toyota is forging ahead with a unique approach, emphasizing hydrogen fuel cell technology as a key component of its sustainable transportation strategy.

title: 2026 Aston Martin DB12 S: The Most Powerful Super Tourer Yet In Pictures
description: Earlier this week, Aston Martin revealed the 2026 DB12 S with "class-leading" performance figures, further separating its so-called "Super Tourer" from the rest of the competition. Along with more power, a louder exhaust, less weight, and quicker acceleration times, the DB12 S also promises ...
titleSummary: "Aston Martin's Fury Unleashed: Meet the Pinnacle of Super Touring Excellence"
descriptionSummary: Aston Martin has unveiled the high-performance 2026 DB12 S, boasting exceptional speed and agility that sets it apart from its rivals. The new model boasts increased power, an aggressive sound, reduced weight, and rapid acceleration capabilities.

After being discontinued in 2011, the ...
titleSummary: "Ram Revives Classic Midsize Muscle with the Resurgent Dakota Pickup"
descriptionSummary: After a long hiatus, Ram revives the iconic Dakota nameplate with a fresh midsize truck, initially targeting South American markets where it will be built in Argentina. A US-market iteration is also on the way.
